ygData.subject: Re: word of possession
ygData.msgSnippet: agreed, Christy went overboard, now to go back on subject... I m willing to trade pages for runes on qeynos/karans areas.  I m a lvl 14 wizard named Enyar on
ygData.messageBody:
agreed, Christy went overboard, now to go back on subject...

I'm willing to trade pages for runes on qeynos/karans areas. I'm a lvl 14
wizard named Enyar on Solusek Ro.

and when you type "/who all jerkface" it says "there's no one by that name
in EverQest" Shouldn't it say "There's no one by that name in NORATH"??

From: Mike <mstawch1@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 16, 1999 11:07 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] word of possession


> From: "Mike" <mstawch1@...>
>

just
